about_the_game:
Meet Norm L Mann, mild-mannered man from Everymanville.

While watering his hydrangeas one day, Norm is plucked from his quiet, aggressively average life and thrust into a bizarre and violent alien world. A million light-years from home our hero finds himself at the mercy of ruthless mob boss Don G and his gang of zanny alien mobsters. To make it home Norm is going to have to punch, slap, dismember, disembowel, and generally murder whoever gets in his way.

All Norm has to protect himself is 20 years of martial arts video cassette tapes, an hour a day on the Stair Master, and a 'slight' anger problem.

Become the Normal Man.

Punch, slap, kick, and generally rampage your way through increasing levels of alien carnage - basking in the damage and chaos left behind.

Build a massive combo by eliminating enemies as fast as possible without getting hit to push your final score into the stratosphere. The more hits you land the quicker you'll fill your finisher bars, allowing you to perform violent feats of dismemberment - the more finishers you use the angrier Norm will get pushing him over the edge...

The World's Your Armory

When fists won't get the job done, grab the nearest chair, knife, or chunk of meat and hurl it at your alien foe. Utilise your environment to push the violence to a whole other level.

Get Harder, Stronger, Better but not necessarily Faster

Upgrade your character to begin finding swords, bats, and spears, each with a unique move-set and finisher, itching to be shoved into the skull cavity of a nearby enemy.

Higher scores and faster times will unlock better upgrades, not just weapons, but more levels, player buffs, and more violent ways to dismember the enemy.

Stranger World

Norm finds himself stuck on a bizarre planet populated by a host of wacky and outlandish (yet strangely familiar) characters. He will battle through a whole range of extremely strange alien locations like art galleries, bathrooms, and restaurants...

content_descriptors.notes:
All combat in Normal Man includes a high level of stylised cartoon violence and dismemberment with a lot of cartoony blood and chunks (think Rick and Morty). 

The blood can be toggled on and off in the settings but dismemberment is part of the game.

name: Normal Man

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7500U (2 * 2700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Follow the exploits of Norm L. Mann, a mild-mannered man from Earth who finds himself trapped in an alien world, with nothing but the sweater vest on his back, 3 hours a day on the stair master, and a love for kungfu VHS tapes. Become the Normal Man...
